extensionAttribute.description: This will report on the last call time and date from client to Absolute, based on the modification time and date to the /Library/Preferences/com.absolute.settings file.
extensionAttribute.scriptContentsMac: #!/bin/sh #This script has been tested to work on OS X 10.5.x-10.7.2. #Check to see if Computrace call in Date and Time. #Date and time reported reflect the Computrace servers, and might be different then your local time zone.. #Sean Gallagher - seanjsgallagher@me.com if [ -f "/Library/Preferences/com.absolute.settings" ]; then result=`/usr/bin/mdls -name kMDItemFSContentChangeDate -raw /Library/Preferences/com.absolute.settings | awk '{print $1, $2}'` echo "<result>$result</result>" else echo "<result>Not installed</result>" fi
